alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 8:42AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Smith, western De Kalb, northeastern Rutherford, southeastern Wilson and northern Cannon Counties through 930 AM CST... At 842 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walterhill, or near Murfreesboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Woodbury, Watertown, Walterhill, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Lascassas, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Center Hill Lake, Edgar Evans State Park, Milton and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 264 and 266. Interstate 24 between mile markers 77 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
